templates.title: Readeck
templates.name: readeck
templates.description: Readeck is a simple web application that lets you save the precious readable content of web pages you like and want to keep forever. It is a self-hosted alternative to Instapaper and Wallabag with a modern interface and powerful features for managing your bookmarks and reading list.
templates.note: Self-hosted bookmark manager and read-it-later app

env.name: READECK_LOG_LEVEL
env.label: READECK_LOG_LEVEL
env.description: Application log level (error, warn, info, debug)

env.name: READECK_SERVER_HOST
env.label: READECK_SERVER_HOST
env.description: IP address on which Readeck listens

env.name: READECK_SERVER_PORT
env.label: READECK_SERVER_PORT
env.description: TCP port on which Readeck listens
